summary: Alduin retexture with glow effects, available in four styles.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#EBE1E0]
[img]http://orig03.deviantart.net/bc3d/f/2016/009/1/6/header_by_versispellis-d9nahnq.png[/img]

[youtube]VqToabcpnV4[/youtube]

[img]http://orig14.deviantart.net/e9f2/f/2016/009/8/5/about_by_versispellis-d9nahnv.png[/img]

I am tentatively calling this a beta release.  I don't know whether I'll
revise it,but I also hesitate to call it a finished product.  This is my 
first mod.  Criticisms and suggestions are welcome!

This began as a simple mashup of two of the most popular Alduin
texture mods, but it soon became something more.  Textures were
repainted and optimized in Adobe Photoshop CS6.  If you would like to
see a catalogue of exact changes that were made to the original assets,
refer to the 'read me' section.

 The textures are 2k, and this mod includes detailed glowmaps
and it comes in four varieties.  

Files are packaged and ready for either manual installation or
installation via your mod manager of choice.

THIS MOD CONTAINS NO SCRIPTS;
it is safe to uninstall and swap at any time!  

This mod is compatible with anything that doesn't change
the appearance of Alduin.  Full compatibility with Ultimate
Dragons, Deadly Dragons, and Bellyaches New Dragon Species.  
Partial compatibility with Chaos Dragons--select "no vanilla change"
in the FOMOD installer.

Depending on your ENB settings, Alduin may look quite different!
[u]
[b]FUTURE PLANS:[/b][/u]
Fix the alpha channels.  I didn't notice that I accidentally junked them.
This effects the weathered edges of the wings.


[img]http://orig15.deviantart.net/f293/f/2016/009/f/c/cred_by_versispellis-d9nahnu.png[/img]

Assets and inspiration were obtained from the following mods.  
Permission has been granted by the mod authors.  

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54070/?][color=#9C9CC9]More Dramatic Alduin Retexture[/color][/url] | [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59875/?][color=#9C9CC9]Imprefvicticious Alduin[/color][/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4343/?][color=#9C9CC9]Glowy Rune and Effect[/color][/url] | [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4086/?][color=#9C9CC9]Deathwing Inspired Alduin[/color][/url]



[img]http://orig12.deviantart.net/ee0b/f/2016/009/2/a/rec_by_versispellis-d9nahno.png[/img]

Mods to enhance your dragon experience.  

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3829/?][color=#9C9CC9]Deadly Dragons[/color][/url] | [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55206/?][color=#9C9CC9]Ultimate Dragons[/color][/url]
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58813/?][color=#9C9CC9]The Dragon Engine[/color][/url] | [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60934/?][color=#9C9CC9]Dragon Animation Replace[/color][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68005/?][color=#9C9CC9]Bellyaches Dragon Texture Replacer[/color][/url]

Texture resolution too high?  This can help.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12801/?][color=#9C9CC9]Optimizer Textures[/color][/url]

[/color][/center]
